title: Pedagogical and Language Proficiency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of secondary education curricula and basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for the application of science curriculum in educational settings.

learning_goals: Prospective teachers achieve over 80% proficiency in instructional design, student management, and assessment tool development through pedagogical competency evaluations.
Learners improve their ability to articulate scientific concepts in language by 20% through pre- and post-assessment comparisons.
Participants improve their lesson demonstration skills three or more times based on peer feedback in a blended environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
